restaurantInfo.name: Momotaro Sushi
restaurantInfo.address: 2911 Dundas St W, Toronto, ON, M6P 1Z1, CAN
restaurantInfo.parking: Information not readily available online, but typically consists of street parking in this area.

menuItems.name: Miso Soup
menuItems.description: Soybean soup with tofu and seaweed.

menuItems.name: Edamame
menuItems.description: Steamed green soybeans.

menuItems.name: Gyoza
menuItems.description: Pan-fried pork dumplings (6 pcs).

menuItems.name: Harumaki (Spring Roll)
menuItems.description: Deep-fried vegetable spring rolls (4 pcs).

menuItems.name: Shrimp Tempura
menuItems.description: Lightly battered and deep-fried shrimp (5 pcs).

menuItems.name: Vegetable Tempura
menuItems.description: Assorted lightly battered and deep-fried vegetables.

menuItems.name: Agedashi Tofu
menuItems.description: Deep-fried tofu served in a hot tentsuyu broth.

menuItems.name: Green Salad
menuItems.description: Fresh greens with ginger dressing.

menuItems.name: Avocado Salad
menuItems.description: Green salad topped with fresh avocado.

menuItems.name: Seaweed Salad
menuItems.description: Seasoned seaweed salad.

menuItems.name: Avocado & Cucumber Roll
menuItems.description: Avocado and cucumber rolled in sushi rice and nori.

menuItems.name: California Roll
menuItems.description: Crab meat, avocado, and cucumber.

menuItems.name: Spicy Salmon Roll
menuItems.description: Fresh salmon with spicy mayo.

menuItems.description: Fresh tuna with spicy mayo.

menuItems.name: Unagi Roll (Eel)
menuItems.description: BBQ eel with cucumber.

menuItems.name: Dynamite Roll
menuItems.description: Shrimp tempura, avocado, crab meat, cucumber, and fish egg with eel sauce.

menuItems.name: Red Dragon Roll
menuItems.description: A vibrant roll with shrimp tempura and cucumber, topped with fresh tuna.

menuItems.description: Fresh salmon on a bed of sushi rice (1 pc).

menuItems.name: Salmon Sashimi a la Carte
menuItems.description: Slices of fresh raw salmon (3 pcs).

menuItems.name: Salmon Lover
menuItems.description: 4 pieces of salmon sashimi, 4 pieces of salmon sushi, and 6 pieces of spicy salmon roll. Served with miso soup and salad.

menuItems.name: Sushi & Sashimi Combo
menuItems.description: 6 pcs sashimi, 5 pcs sushi, and 6 pcs California roll. Served with miso soup and salad.
